basics.name: Jean-Luc Furlenmeier
basics.label:
SUMMARY:
15 years experience in Pan-European Talent Searches, Corp.Talent Acquisition (in-house), Agency  Recruiting as well as Executive Search experience in both Life Sciences & Information Technology

13 years Interim Mgt. such as running active sourcing & hiring initiatives (via internal and external channels) as well as high volume recruiting projects in corporate environments, using divers sourcing strategies to locate passive & active job seekers to maximize hiring through Social Media direct sourcing channels as well as internal & external referrals. Very experienced to work and collaborate in and with different recruiting models, processes, systems and tools (ATS – e.g. Taloom (Softgarden), Taleo, Kenexa/BrassRing & basics of Workday). Used to target candidates and individuals at all levels within Pharma, Biotechnology, Medical Devices and Biologics as well as in Information Technology, Consulting (Outsourcing & Services).

Mr. Furlenmeier is an international Senior Advisor with in-depth experience in managing full (in-house) recruiting life cycles. While always being comfortable in building relationships across all levels of the businesses with Senior Executives at Corporate level, he is also used to deal, to work and to collaborate with different cultures and mentalities throughout the Pan-European region. He feels always at ease to work in complex matrix organizations while keeping a strong service and delivery orientation.

He has always been working for global companies within the Life Science and/or  Information Technology & Consulting/Outsourcing industry headquartered in Switzerland, Germany, France, Japan and the US. Mr. Furlenmeier is Swiss, speaks fluently English and is native in French, German & Swiss German.

work.summary: Sr. Advisor Talent Sourcing, Talent Attraction & Talent Acquisition Central Europe @
work.desc:
Support & advise Corp. Recruiting Organisations in attracting and winning top talents for their company. Provide operational & strategic recruitment & sourcing services to global market leaders within the Lifesciences, IT Technology & Consulting/Outsourcing industry in Central Europe.

Skilled in identifying those individuals capable of profitable growth in challenging environments. Significant emphasis is on quality of the search process, speed of execution and client satisfaction. Represent customers at the market during specific search assignments, advise them on recruiting procedures & strategies and manage full search execution, candidate- and client/account management.

Offering also in-house recruitment services for specific assignments and manage best practices in full-cycle Talent Acquisition incl. Talent Sourcing & Talent Attraction within Central Europe. Support Talent Acquisition leaders in implementing and rolling-out recruiting models and processes, technologies and systems.

Industries/Sectors: Sen.Mgr. to Executive level across Life Sciences (Pharmaceuticals, Biotechnology, Biologics, Diagnostics & Healthcare). Information Technology (Mobile, Cloud, Big Data, Cyber Security and Mobility).

Specialities: Recruitment Advisory, Active & Passive Talent Sourcing-, Attraction- and Acquisition, Talent Pooling, Talent Mapping, Market Mapping, Inhouse Recruitment, Headhunting, retained and contingency recruitments.

education.studyType: Independent Education in General Management, Business Administration & Economy, (Leadership, Team-Building, Self-Awareness & Dev., Decision Making, Negotiation, Staffing Policy)
Independent education in Human Resources Management & Services (HR Mgt, Labor & Employment Law, Social Security, Payroll & Taxes, Communication & Interaction, Business Operations & Economics).
Commercial Apprentice-ship with Swiss Diploma, Int. Freight Forwarding & Logistics
